    end

    @class Roles begin
        roles_role_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:roles_role_code])
        role_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:role_description])
    end

    @class Addresses begin
        address_id ~ Unmodeled()
        address_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:address_details])
    end

    @class Reference_document_status begin
        reference_document_status_document_status_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:reference_document_status_document_status_code])
        document_status_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:document_status_description])
    end

    @class Reference_shipping_agents begin
        reference_shipping_agents_shipping_agent_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:reference_shipping_agents_shipping_agent_code])
        shipping_agent_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:shipping_agent_name])
        shipping_agent_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:shipping_agent_description])
    end

    @class Documents begin
        documents_document_id ~ Unmodeled()
        reference_document_status ~ Reference_document_status
        reference_document_types ~ Reference_document_types
        reference_shipping_agents ~ Reference_shipping_agents
        receipt_date ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:receipt_date])
        receipt_number ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:receipt_number])
        documents_other_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:documents_other_details])
    end

    @class Employees begin
        employees_employee_id ~ Unmodeled()
        roles ~ Roles
        employee_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:employee_name])
        employees_other_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:employees_other_details])
    end

    @class Document_drafts begin
        documents ~ Documents
        draft_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:draft_details])
    end

    @class Draft_copies begin
        document_drafts ~ Document_drafts
        draft_copies_copy_number ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:draft_copies_copy_number])
    end

    @class Circulation_history begin
        draft_copies ~ Draft_copies
        employees ~ Employees
    end

    @class Documents_mailed begin
        documents ~ Documents
        addresses ~ Addresses
        mailing_date ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:mailing_date])
    end

    @class Obs begin
        circulation_history ~ Circulation_history
        documents_mailed ~ Documents_mailed
        @learned avg_document_drafts_draft_number::Dict{String, MeanParameter{12.666666666666666, 10.214368964029708}}
        unit_document_drafts_draft_number ~ ChooseUniformly(units)
        document_drafts_draft_number_base = avg_document_drafts_draft_number["$(circulation_history.draft_copies.document_drafts.draft_details)"]
        document_drafts_draft_number ~ TransformedGaussian(document_drafts_draft_number_base, 10.214368964029708/10, unit_document_drafts_draft_number)
        document_drafts_draft_number_corrected = round(unit_document_drafts_draft_number.backward(document_drafts_draft_number))
    end

PClean.@model StudentTranscriptsTrackingModel begin
    @class Addresses begin

        other_address_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:other_address_details])
    end

        courses_course_id ~ Unmodeled()
        course_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:course_name])
        course_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:course_description])
        courses_other_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:courses_other_details])
    end

    @class Departments begin
        department_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:department_name])
        department_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:department_description])
        departments_other_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:departments_other_details])
    end

    @class Degree_programs begin
        degree_programs_degree_program_id ~ Unmodeled()
        departments ~ Departments
        degree_summary_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:degree_summary_name])
        degree_summary_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:degree_summary_description])
        degree_programs_other_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:degree_programs_other_details])
    end

    @class Sections begin
        section_id ~ Unmodeled()
        courses ~ Courses
        section_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:section_name])
        section_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:section_description])
        sections_other_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:sections_other_details])
    end

    @class Semesters begin
        semester_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:semester_name])
        semester_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:semester_description])
        semesters_other_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:semesters_other_details])
    end

    @class Students begin
        students_student_id ~ Unmodeled()
        addresses ~ Addresses
        first_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:first_name])
        middle_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:middle_name])
        last_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:last_name])
        cell_mobile_number ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:cell_mobile_number])

        ssn ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:ssn])
        date_first_registered ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_first_registered])
        date_left ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_left])
        other_student_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:other_student_details])
    end

    @class Student_enrolment begin
        student_enrolment_id ~ Unmodeled()
        degree_programs ~ Degree_programs
        semesters ~ Semesters
        students ~ Students
        student_enrolment_other_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:student_enrolment_other_details])
    end

    @class Student_enrolment_courses begin
        student_enrolment_courses_student_course_id ~ Unmodeled()
        courses ~ Courses
        student_enrolment ~ Student_enrolment
    end

    @class Transcripts begin
        transcripts_transcript_id ~ Unmodeled()
        transcript_date ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:transcript_date])
        transcripts_other_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:transcripts_other_details])
    end

    @class Transcript_contents begin
        student_enrolment_courses ~ Student_enrolment_courses
        transcripts ~ Transcripts
    end

    @class Obs begin
        sections ~ Sections
        transcript_contents ~ Transcript_contents
    end
end

PClean.@model CreDocsAndEpensesModel begin
    @class Document_type_name begin
        document_type_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:document_type_name])
    end

    @class Reference_document_types begin
        reference_document_types_document_type_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:reference_document_types_document_type_code])
        document_type_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:document_type_description])
    end

    @class Reference_budget_codes begin
        reference_budget_codes_budget_type_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:reference_budget_codes_budget_type_code])
        budget_type_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:budget_type_description])
    end

    @class Projects begin
        projects_project_id ~ Unmodeled()
        project_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:project_details])
    end

    @class Documents begin
        documents_document_id ~ Unmodeled()
        reference_document_types ~ Reference_document_types
        projects ~ Projects
        document_date ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:document_date])
        document_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:document_name])
        document_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:document_description])
        other_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:other_details])
    end

    @class Statements begin
        documents ~ Documents
        statement_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:statement_details])
    end

    @class Documents_with_expenses begin
        documents ~ Documents
        reference_budget_codes ~ Reference_budget_codes
        document_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:document_details])
    end

    @class Accounts begin
        statements ~ Statements
        account_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:account_details])
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        document_type_name ~ Document_type_name
        documents_with_expenses ~ Documents_with_expenses
        accounts ~ Accounts
        error_prob_document_type_name = error_probs[document_type_name.document_type_name]
        reference_document_types_document_type_code ~ MaybeSwap(documents_with_expenses.documents.reference_document_types.reference_document_types_document_type_code, swap_possibilities["$(documents_with_expenses.documents.reference_document_types.document_type_description)-reference_document_types_document_type_code"], error_prob_document_type_name)
        document_description ~ AddTypos(documents_with_expenses.documents.document_description, 2)
    end
end

PClean.@model ShipMissionModel begin
    @class Code begin
        code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:code])
    end

    @class Mission begin
        mission_id ~ Unmodeled()
        ship ~ Ship
        launched_year ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:launched_year])
        location ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:location])
        speed_knots ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:speed_knots])
        fate ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:fate])
    end

    @class Ship begin
        ship_id ~ Unmodeled()
        name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:name])
        type ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:type])
        nationality ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:nationality])
        tonnage ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:tonnage])
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        code ~ Code
        mission ~ Mission
        error_prob_code = error_probs[code.code]
        location ~ MaybeSwap(mission.location, swap_possibilities["$(mission.mission_id)-location"], error_prob_code)
        name ~ AddTypos(mission.ship.name, 2)
        type ~ AddTypos(mission.ship.type, 2)
    end
end

PClean.@model CustomersCardTransactionsModel begin

        transaction_type ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:transaction_type])
        transaction_date ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:transaction_date])
        transaction_comment ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:transaction_comment])
        other_transaction_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:other_transaction_details])

        date_valid_to ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_valid_to])
        other_card_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:other_card_details])
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        transaction_amount ~ Transaction_amount
        financial_transactions ~ Financial_transactions
        error_prob_transaction_amount = error_probs[transaction_amount.transaction_amount]

end

The table documents has columns documents_document_id, documents_template_id, document_name, document_description, and documents_other_details. The table paragraphs has columns paragraph_id, paragraphs_document_id, paragraph_text, and paragraphs_other_details. Finally, templates_template_type_code of templates is a foreign key reference to reference_template_types_template_type_code of reference_template_types, documents_template_id of documents is a foreign key reference to templates_template_id of templates, and paragraphs_document_id of paragraphs is a foreign key reference to documents_document_id of documents.

PClean.@model CreDocTemplateMgtModel begin
    @class Paragraph_id begin
        paragraph_id ~ Unmodeled()
    end

    @class Paragraphs begin
        documents ~ Documents
        paragraph_text ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:paragraph_text])
        paragraphs_other_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:paragraphs_other_details])
    end

    @class Reference_template_types begin
        reference_template_types_template_type_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:reference_template_types_template_type_code])
        template_type_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:template_type_description])
    end

    @class Templates begin
        templates_template_id ~ Unmodeled()
        version_number ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:version_number])
        reference_template_types ~ Reference_template_types
        date_effective_from ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_effective_from])
        date_effective_to ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_effective_to])
        template_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:template_details])
    end

    @class Documents begin
        templates ~ Templates
        document_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:document_name])
        document_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:document_description])
        documents_other_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:documents_other_details])
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        paragraphs ~ Paragraphs
        error_prob_paragraph_id = error_probs[paragraph_id.paragraph_id]
        paragraph_text ~ MaybeSwap(paragraphs.paragraph_text, swap_possibilities["$(paragraphs.paragraphs_other_details)-paragraph_text"], error_prob_paragraph_id)
    end
end

PClean.@model DeviceModel begin
    @class Software_platform begin
        software_platform ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:software_platform])
    end

    @class Device begin
        device_id ~ Unmodeled()
        device ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:device])
        carrier ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:carrier])
        package_version ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:package_version])
        applications ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:applications])
    end

    @class Shop begin
        shop_id ~ Unmodeled()
        shop_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:shop_name])
        location ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:location])
        open_date ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:open_date])
    end

    @class Stock begin
        shop ~ Shop
        device ~ Device
        quantity ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:quantity])
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        software_platform ~ Software_platform
        stock ~ Stock
        error_prob_software_platform = error_probs[software_platform.software_platform]
        device ~ AddTypos(stock.device.device, 2)
        @learned avg_open_year::Dict{String, MeanParameter{2011.4, 3.7815340802378077}}
        unit_open_year ~ ChooseUniformly(units)
        open_year_base = avg_open_year["$(stock.shop.shop_name)_$(stock.shop.location)_$(stock.shop.open_date)"]
        open_year ~ TransformedGaussian(open_year_base, 3.7815340802378077/10, unit_open_year)
        open_year_corrected = round(unit_open_year.backward(open_year))
    end
end

PClean.@model Hr1Model begin
    @class Location_id begin
        location_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:location_id])
    end

    @class Departments begin
        departments_department_id ~ Unmodeled()
        department_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:department_name])
        departments_manager_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:departments_manager_id])
    end

    @class Jobs begin
        jobs_job_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:jobs_job_id])
        job_title ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:job_title])
        min_salary ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:min_salary])
    end

    @class Employees begin
        employees_employee_id ~ Unmodeled()
        first_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:first_name])
        last_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:last_name])
        email ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:email])
        phone_number ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:phone_number])
        hire_date ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:hire_date])
        jobs ~ Jobs
        salary ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:salary])
        commission_pct ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:commission_pct])
        employees_manager_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:employees_manager_id])
        departments ~ Departments
    end

    @class Job_history begin
        employees ~ Employees
        start_date ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:start_date])
        end_date ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:end_date])
        jobs ~ Jobs
        departments ~ Departments
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        location_id ~ Location_id
        job_history ~ Job_history
        error_prob_location_id = error_probs[location_id.location_id]
        @learned avg_max_salary::Dict{String, MeanParameter{12000.0, NaN}}
        unit_max_salary ~ ChooseUniformly(units)
        max_salary_base = avg_max_salary["$(job_history.employees.jobs.jobs_job_id)_$(job_history.employees.jobs.job_title)"]
        max_salary ~ TransformedGaussian(max_salary_base, NaN/10, unit_max_salary)
        max_salary_corrected = round(unit_max_salary.backward(max_salary))
        email ~ AddTypos(job_history.employees.email, 2)
    end
end

PClean.@model RealEstatePropertiesModel begin
    @class Feature_description begin
        feature_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:feature_description])
    end

    @class Other_available_features begin
        other_available_features_feature_id ~ Unmodeled()
        reference_feature_types ~ Reference_feature_types
        feature_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:feature_name])
    end

    @class Reference_feature_types begin
        reference_feature_types_feature_type_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:reference_feature_types_feature_type_code])
        feature_type_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:feature_type_name])
    end

    @class Reference_property_types begin
        reference_property_types_property_type_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:reference_property_types_property_type_code])
        property_type_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:property_type_description])
    end

    @class Properties begin
        properties_property_id ~ Unmodeled()
        reference_property_types ~ Reference_property_types
        date_on_market ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_on_market])
        date_sold ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_sold])
        property_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:property_name])
        property_address ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:property_address])
        room_count ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:room_count])
        vendor_requested_price ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:vendor_requested_price])
        buyer_offered_price ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:buyer_offered_price])
        agreed_selling_price ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:agreed_selling_price])
        apt_feature_1 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:apt_feature_1])
        apt_feature_2 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:apt_feature_2])
        apt_feature_3 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:apt_feature_3])
        fld_feature_1 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:fld_feature_1])
        fld_feature_2 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:fld_feature_2])
        fld_feature_3 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:fld_feature_3])
        hse_feature_1 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:hse_feature_1])
        hse_feature_2 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:hse_feature_2])
        hse_feature_3 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:hse_feature_3])
        oth_feature_1 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:oth_feature_1])
        oth_feature_2 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:oth_feature_2])
        oth_feature_3 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:oth_feature_3])
        shp_feature_1 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:shp_feature_1])
        shp_feature_2 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:shp_feature_2])
        shp_feature_3 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:shp_feature_3])
        other_property_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:other_property_details])
    end

    @class Other_property_features begin
        properties ~ Properties
        other_available_features ~ Other_available_features
        property_feature_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:property_feature_description])
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        feature_description ~ Feature_description
        other_property_features ~ Other_property_features
        error_prob_feature_description = error_probs[feature_description.feature_description]
    end
end

PClean.@model CourseTeachModel begin

        name ~ Name

        staring_date ~ AddTypos(course_arrange.course.staring_date, 2)

        hometown ~ MaybeSwap(course_arrange.teacher.hometown, swap_possibilities["$(course_arrange.teacher.teacher_id)-hometown"], error_prob_name)

PClean.@model GameInjuryModel begin
    @class Source begin
        source ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:source])
    end

    @class Injury_accident begin
        game ~ Game
        injury_accident_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:injury_accident_id])
        player ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:player])
        injury ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:injury])
        number_of_matches ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:number_of_matches])
    end

    @class Stadium begin
        stadium_id ~ Unmodeled()
        name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:name])
        home_games ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:home_games])
        average_attendance ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:average_attendance])
        total_attendance ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:total_attendance])
        capacity_percentage ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:capacity_percentage])
    end

    @class Game begin
        stadium ~ Stadium
        game_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:game_id])
        season ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:season])
        date ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:date])
        home_team ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:home_team])
        away_team ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:away_team])
        score ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:score])
        competition ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:competition])
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        source ~ Source
        injury_accident ~ Injury_accident
        error_prob_source = error_probs[source.source]
        player ~ AddTypos(injury_accident.player, 2)
        number_of_matches ~ MaybeSwap(injury_accident.number_of_matches, swap_possibilities["$(injury_accident.injury)-number_of_matches"], error_prob_source)
    end
end

PClean.@model SchoolFinanceModel begin
    @class Donator_name begin
        donator_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:donator_name])
    end

    @class Endowment begin
        endowment_id ~ Unmodeled()
        school ~ School
        amount ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:amount])
    end

    @class School begin
        school_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:school_id])
        school_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:school_name])
        location ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:location])
        mascot ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:mascot])
        enrollment ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:enrollment])
        ihsaa_class ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:ihsaa_class])
        ihsaa_football_class ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:ihsaa_football_class])
        county ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:county])
    end

    @class Budget begin
        school ~ School
        budgeted ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:budgeted])
        total_budget_percent_budgeted ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:total_budget_percent_budgeted])
        invested ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:invested])
        total_budget_percent_invested ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:total_budget_percent_invested])
        budget_invested_percent ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:budget_invested_percent])
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        donator_name ~ Donator_name
        budget ~ Budget
        endowment ~ Endowment
        error_prob_donator_name = error_probs[donator_name.donator_name]
        @learned avg_year::Dict{String, MeanParameter{2002.5, 2.449489742783178}}
        unit_year ~ ChooseUniformly(units)
        year_base = avg_year["$(budget.budget_invested_percent)"]
        year ~ TransformedGaussian(year_base, 2.449489742783178/10, unit_year)
        year_corrected = round(unit_year.backward(year))
        amount ~ MaybeSwap(endowment.amount, swap_possibilities["$(endowment.endowment_id)-amount"], error_prob_donator_name)
    end
end

Yes! The following describes the schema: The schema has 4 tables, which we'll call country, team, match_season, and player. The table country has columns country_id, country_name, capital, and official_native_language. The table team has columns team_id and name. The table match_season has columns season, match_season_player, position, country, match_season_team, draft_pick_number, draft_class, and college. The table player has columns player_id, player, years_played, total_wl, singles_wl, doubles_wl, and player_team. Finally, country of match_season is a foreign key reference to country_id of country, match_season_team of match_season is a foreign key reference to team_id of team, and player_team of player is a foreign key reference to team_id of team.

Awesome! Now, based on this schema and the previously provided error description, please write a PClean program that describes the schema of the dataset and the errors it contains. Please only include the PClean program in your response, without any preceding or following text.

PClean.@model MatchSeasonModel begin
    @class College begin
        college ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:college])
    end

    @class Match_season begin
        season ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:season])
        match_season_player ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:match_season_player])
        position ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:position])
        country ~ Country
        team ~ Team
        draft_class ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:draft_class])
    end

    @class Country begin
        country_id ~ Unmodeled()
        country_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:country_name])
        capital ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:capital])
        official_native_language ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:official_native_language])
    end

    @class Team begin
        team_id ~ Unmodeled()
        name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:name])
    end

    @class Player begin
        player_id ~ Unmodeled()
        player ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:player])
        years_played ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:years_played])
        total_wl ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:total_wl])
        singles_wl ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:singles_wl])
        doubles_wl ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:doubles_wl])
        team ~ Team
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        college ~ College
        match_season ~ Match_season
        player ~ Player
        error_prob_college = error_probs[college.college]
        @learned avg_draft_pick_number::Dict{String, MeanParameter{29.75, 38.55191305240247}}
        unit_draft_pick_number ~ ChooseUniformly(units)
        draft_pick_number_base = avg_draft_pick_number["$(match_season.match_season_player)_$(match_season.position)_$(match_season.draft_class)_$(match_season.college)"]
        draft_pick_number ~ TransformedGaussian(draft_pick_number_base, 38.55191305240247/10, unit_draft_pick_number)
        draft_pick_number_corrected = round(unit_draft_pick_number.backward(draft_pick_number))
        draft_class ~ MaybeSwap(match_season.draft_class, swap_possibilities["$(match_season.position)-draft_class"], error_prob_college)
        years_played ~ AddTypos(player.years_played, 2)
    end
end

query = @query MatchSeasonModel.Obs [
    country_name match_season.country.country_name
    capital match_season.country.capital
    official_native_language match_season.country.official_native_language
    name match_season.team.name
    season match_season.season
    match_season_player match_season.match_season_player
    position match_season.position
    draft_pick_number draft_pick_number_corrected draft_pick_number
    draft_class match_season.draft_class draft_class

    player player.player
    years_played player.years_played years_played
    total_wl player.total_wl
    singles_wl player.singles_wl
    doubles_wl player.doubles_wl
]

PClean.@model SmallBank1Model begin
    @class Accounts begin
        name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:name])
    end

    @class Savings begin
        accounts ~ Accounts
        savings_balance ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:savings_balance])
    end

    @class Checking begin
        accounts ~ Accounts
        checking_balance ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:checking_balance])
    end

    @class Obs begin
        savings ~ Savings
        checking ~ Checking
        name ~ AddTypos(savings.accounts.name, 2)
    end
end

PClean.@model Loan1Model begin
    @class Bank begin
        bank_branch_id ~ Unmodeled()
        bname ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:bname])

        city ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:city])

    end

    @class Customer begin
        customer_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:customer_id])
        customer_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:customer_name])
        account_type ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:account_type])
        account_balance ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:account_balance])
        credit_score ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:credit_score])
        bank ~ Bank
        customer_state ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:customer_state])
    end

    @class Loan begin
        loan_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:loan_id])
        loan_type ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:loan_type])
        loan_customer_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:loan_customer_id])
        bank ~ Bank
        amount ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:amount])

        customer ~ Customer
        loan ~ Loan
        bname ~ AddTypos(customer.bank.bname, 2)
        @learned avg_number_of_loans::Dict{String, MeanParameter{1.0, 1.0}}
        unit_number_of_loans ~ ChooseUniformly(units)
        number_of_loans_base = avg_number_of_loans["$(customer.customer_id)_$(customer.customer_name)_$(customer.account_type)_$(customer.customer_state)"]
        number_of_loans ~ TransformedGaussian(number_of_loans_base, 1.0/10, unit_number_of_loans)
        number_of_loans_corrected = round(unit_number_of_loans.backward(number_of_loans))
    end
end

    @class Student_last_name begin
        student_last_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:student_last_name])

        student_first_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:student_first_name])
        age ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:age])
        student_sex ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:student_sex])
        advisor ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:advisor])
        city_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:city_code])
    end

    @class Activity begin
        activity_id ~ Unmodeled()
        activity_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:activity_name])
    end

    @class Faculty begin
        faculty_id ~ Unmodeled()
        faculty_last_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:faculty_last_name])
        faculty_first_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:faculty_first_name])
        rank ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:rank])
        faculty_sex ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:faculty_sex])
        phone ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:phone])
        room ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:room])
        building ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:building])
    end

    @class Participates_in begin
        student ~ Student
        activity ~ Activity
    end

    @class Faculty_participates_in begin
        faculty ~ Faculty
        activity ~ Activity
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        student_last_name ~ Student_last_name
        participates_in ~ Participates_in
        faculty_participates_in ~ Faculty_participates_in
        error_prob_student_last_name = error_probs[student_last_name.student_last_name]
        age ~ MaybeSwap(participates_in.student.age, swap_possibilities["$(participates_in.student.student_first_name)-age"], error_prob_student_last_name)
        @learned avg_major::Dict{String, MeanParameter{600.0, NaN}}
        unit_major ~ ChooseUniformly(units)
        major_base = avg_major["$(participates_in.student.student_last_name)_$(participates_in.student.student_first_name)_$(participates_in.student.student_sex)_$(participates_in.student.city_code)"]
        major ~ TransformedGaussian(major_base, NaN/10, unit_major)
        major_corrected = round(unit_major.backward(major))
        faculty_last_name ~ AddTypos(faculty_participates_in.faculty.faculty_last_name, 2)
    end
end

PClean.@model Twitter1Model begin

    end

        name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:name])
        email ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:email])

    end

        text ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:text])
        create_date ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:create_date])
    end

        follows ~ Follows
        tweets ~ Tweets

        unit_followers ~ ChooseUniformly(units)

        followers ~ TransformedGaussian(followers_base, 3.987370599767721e7/10, unit_followers)
        followers_corrected = round(unit_followers.backward(followers))
    end
end

PClean.@model NewsReportModel begin
    @class Event_id begin
        event_id ~ Unmodeled()
    end

    @class Event begin
        date ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:date])
        venue ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:venue])
        event_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:event_name])
        event_attendance ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:event_attendance])
    end

    @class Journalist begin
        journalist_id ~ Unmodeled()
        journalist_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:journalist_name])
        nationality ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:nationality])
        age ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:age])
        years_working ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:years_working])
    end

    @class News_report begin
        journalist ~ Journalist
        event ~ Event
        work_type ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:work_type])
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        news_report ~ News_report
        error_prob_event_id = error_probs[event_id.event_id]
        venue ~ AddTypos(news_report.event.venue, 2)
        event_name ~ MaybeSwap(news_report.event.event_name, swap_possibilities["$(news_report.event.event_attendance)-event_name"], error_prob_event_id)
    end
end

The table appellations has columns appellations_no, appellations_appelation, county, appellations_state, area, and isava. The table wine has columns wine_no, wine_grape, winery, wine_appelation, wine_state, name, year, price, score, cases, and drink. PClean.@model Wine1Model begin
    @class Isava begin
        isava ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:isava])
    end

    @class Appellations begin
        appellations_no ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:appellations_no])
        appellations_appelation ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:appellations_appelation])
        county ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:county])
        appellations_state ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:appellations_state])
        area ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:area])
    end

    @class Grapes begin
        grapes_grape ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:grapes_grape])
        color ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:color])
    end

    @class Wine begin
        wine_no ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:wine_no])
        grapes ~ Grapes
        winery ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:winery])
        appellations ~ Appellations
        wine_state ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:wine_state])
        name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:name])
        price ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:price])
        score ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:score])
        cases ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:cases])
        drink ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:drink])
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        isava ~ Isava
        wine ~ Wine
        error_prob_isava = error_probs[isava.isava]
        area ~ MaybeSwap(wine.appellations.area, swap_possibilities["$(wine.appellations.county)-area"], error_prob_isava)
        @learned avg_year::Dict{String, MeanParameter{2008.0, 1.0}}
        unit_year ~ ChooseUniformly(units)
        year_base = avg_year["$(wine.wine_grape)_$(wine.winery)_$(wine.wine_appelation)_$(wine.wine_state)_$(wine.name)_$(wine.drink)"]
        year ~ TransformedGaussian(year_base, 1.0/10, unit_year)
        year_corrected = round(unit_year.backward(year))
    end
end

PClean.@model CustomersAndAddressesModel begin
    @class Country begin
        country ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:country])
    end

    @class Addresses begin
        address_content ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:address_content])
        city ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:city])
        zip_postcode ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:zip_postcode])
        state_province_county ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:state_province_county])
        other_address_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:other_address_details])
    end

    @class Products begin
        products_product_id ~ Unmodeled()
        product_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:product_details])
    end

    @class Customers begin
        payment_method ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:payment_method])
        customer_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:customer_name])
        date_became_customer ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_became_customer])
        other_customer_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:other_customer_details])
    end

    @class Customer_addresses begin
        customers ~ Customers
        addresses ~ Addresses
        date_address_from ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_address_from])
        address_type ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:address_type])
        date_address_to ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_address_to])
    end

    @class Customer_contact_channels begin
        customers ~ Customers
        channel_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:channel_code])
        active_from_date ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:active_from_date])
        active_to_date ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:active_to_date])
        contact_number ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:contact_number])
    end

    @class Customer_orders begin
        customer_orders_order_id ~ Unmodeled()
        customers ~ Customers
        order_status ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:order_status])
        order_date ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:order_date])
        order_details ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:order_details])
    end

    @class Order_items begin
        customer_orders ~ Customer_orders
        products ~ Products
        order_quantity ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:order_quantity])
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        country ~ Country
        customer_addresses ~ Customer_addresses
        customer_contact_channels ~ Customer_contact_channels
        order_items ~ Order_items
        error_prob_country = error_probs[country.country]
        state_province_county ~ MaybeSwap(customer_addresses.addresses.state_province_county, swap_possibilities["$(customer_addresses.addresses.other_address_details)-state_province_county"], error_prob_country)
    end
end

PClean.@model ProteinInstituteModel begin
    @class Sequence_length begin
        sequence_length ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:sequence_length])
    end

    @class Protein begin
        common_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:common_name])
        protein_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:protein_name])
        divergence_from_human_lineage ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:divergence_from_human_lineage])
        accession_number ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:accession_number])
        sequence_identity_to_human_protein ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:sequence_identity_to_human_protein])
        institution ~ Institution
    end

    @class Building begin
        building_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:building_id])
        name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:name])
        street_address ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:street_address])
        years_as_tallest ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:years_as_tallest])
        height_feet ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:height_feet])
        floors ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:floors])
    end

    @class Institution begin
        institution_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:institution_id])
        institution ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:institution])
        location ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:location])
        founded ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:founded])
        type ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:type])
        enrollment ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:enrollment])
        team ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:team])
        primary_conference ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:primary_conference])
        building ~ Building
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        sequence_length ~ Sequence_length
        protein ~ Protein
        error_prob_sequence_length = error_probs[sequence_length.sequence_length]
        street_address ~ AddTypos(protein.institution.building.street_address, 2)
        divergence_from_human_lineage ~ MaybeSwap(protein.divergence_from_human_lineage, swap_possibilities["$(protein.common_name)-divergence_from_human_lineage"], error_prob_sequence_length)
    end
end

        player ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:player])

        age ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:age])
        position ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:position])

    end
end

PClean.@model CustomerComplaintsModel begin
    @class Staff begin
        staff_id ~ Unmodeled()
        gender ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:gender])
        first_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:first_name])
        last_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:last_name])
        staff_email_address ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:staff_email_address])
        staff_phone_number ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:staff_phone_number])
    end

    @class Customers begin
        customers_customer_id ~ Unmodeled()
        customer_type_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:customer_type_code])
        address_line_1 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:address_line_1])
        address_line_2 ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:address_line_2])
        town_city ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:town_city])
        state ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:state])
        customers_email_address ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:customers_email_address])
        customers_phone_number ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:customers_phone_number])
    end

    @class Products begin
        products_product_id ~ Unmodeled()
        product_category_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:product_category_code])
        date_product_first_available ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_product_first_available])
        date_product_discontinued ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_product_discontinued])
        product_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:product_name])
        product_description ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:product_description])
    end

    @class Complaints begin
        complaint_id ~ Unmodeled()
        products ~ Products
        customers ~ Customers
        complaint_outcome_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:complaint_outcome_code])
        complaint_status_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:complaint_status_code])
        complaint_type_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:complaint_type_code])
        date_complaint_raised ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_complaint_raised])
        date_complaint_closed ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_complaint_closed])
        staff ~ Staff
    end

    @class Obs begin
        complaints ~ Complaints
        @learned avg_parent_product_id::Dict{String, MeanParameter{6.0, 2.943920288775949}}
        unit_parent_product_id ~ ChooseUniformly(units)
        parent_product_id_base = avg_parent_product_id["$(complaints.products.product_category_code)_$(complaints.products.product_name)_$(complaints.products.product_description)"]
        parent_product_id ~ TransformedGaussian(parent_product_id_base, 2.943920288775949/10, unit_parent_product_id)
        parent_product_id_corrected = round(unit_parent_product_id.backward(parent_product_id))
        product_category_code ~ AddTypos(complaints.products.product_category_code, 2)
        @learned avg_product_price::Dict{String, MeanParameter{42.805, 46.71632441306429}}
        unit_product_price ~ ChooseUniformly(units)
        product_price_base = avg_product_price["$(complaints.products.product_category_code)_$(complaints.products.product_name)_$(complaints.products.product_description)"]
        product_price ~ TransformedGaussian(product_price_base, 46.71632441306429/10, unit_product_price)
        product_price_corrected = round(unit_product_price.backward(product_price))
    end
end

        customer_phone ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:customer_phone])
        customer_email ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:customer_email])
    end

    @class Customer_address_history begin
        customers ~ Customers
        addresses ~ Addresses
        date_from ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_from])
        date_to ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_to])
    end

    @class Customer_orders begin
        customer_orders_order_id ~ Unmodeled()
        customers ~ Customers
        order_date ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:order_date])
        order_status_code ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:order_status_code])
    end

    @class Order_items begin
        order_item_id ~ Unmodeled()
        customer_orders ~ Customer_orders
        products ~ Products

    end

PClean.@model ProductCatalogModel begin
    @class Date_of_publication begin
        date_of_publication ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_of_publication])
    end

    @class Catalogs begin
        catalogs_catalog_id ~ Unmodeled()
        catalog_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:catalog_name])
        catalog_publisher ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:catalog_publisher])
        date_of_latest_revision ~ TimePrior(possibilities[:date_of_latest_revision])
    end

    @class Catalog_structure begin
        catalog_structure_catalog_level_number ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:catalog_structure_catalog_level_number])
        catalogs ~ Catalogs
        catalog_level_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:catalog_level_name])
    end

    @class Catalog_contents begin
        catalog_contents_catalog_entry_id ~ Unmodeled()
        catalog_structure ~ Catalog_structure
        parent_entry_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:parent_entry_id])
        previous_entry_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:previous_entry_id])
        next_entry_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:next_entry_id])
        catalog_entry_name ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:catalog_entry_name])
        product_stock_number ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:product_stock_number])
        price_in_dollars ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:price_in_dollars])
        price_in_euros ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:price_in_euros])
        price_in_pounds ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:price_in_pounds])
        capacity ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:capacity])
        length ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:length])
        height ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:height])
        width ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:width])
    end

    @class Catalog_contents_additional_attributes begin
        catalog_contents ~ Catalog_contents
        catalog_structure ~ Catalog_structure
        attribute_id ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:attribute_id])
        attribute_value ~ ChooseUniformly(possibilities[:attribute_value])
    end

    @class Obs begin
        @learned error_probs::Dict{String, ProbParameter{10.0, 50.0}}
        date_of_publication ~ Date_of_publication
        catalog_contents_additional_attributes ~ Catalog_contents_additional_attributes
        error_prob_date_of_publication = error_probs[date_of_publication.date_of_publication]
    end
end
